project_path.Omax: contracts/OMAX TOKEN Full Smart Contract Security Audit/Omax

findings.title: Owner Privilege: Change Tax, Burn, Market, and Liquidity Fees
findings.description: The owner has the ability to change tax, burn, market, and liquidity fees, which could be a potential security risk if not properly managed.

findings.title: Owner Privilege: Change Maximum Transaction Amount
findings.description: The owner has the ability to change the maximum transaction amount, which could be a potential security risk if not properly managed.

findings.title: Owner Privilege: Enable/Disable Fees
findings.description: The owner has the ability to enable/disable fees, which could be a potential security risk if not properly managed.

findings.title: Owner Privilege: Change Marketing Wallet
findings.description: The owner has the ability to change the marketing wallet, which could be a potential security risk if not properly managed.

findings.title: Owner Privilege: Change Sell Fee Multiplier
findings.description: The owner has the ability to change the sell fee multiplier, which could be a potential security risk if not properly managed.

findings.title: Owner Privilege: Exclude from Fee
findings.description: The owner has the ability to exclude certain transactions from fees, which could be a potential security risk if not properly managed.
